snippet: The rate of growth in the price of employer-based health coverage appears to be stabilizing.
abstract: Editorial contends survey of more than 2,000 employers conducted by Kaiser Family Foundation and Health Research and Educational Trust has found encouraging indicators about employer-sponsored health insurance; notes in particular that price of employed-based coverage appears to be stabilizing.
lead_paragraph: The rate of growth in the price of employer-based health coverage appears to be stabilizing.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
